title: Practical Statistics Competency Strengthening Program for Elementary School Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic statistical terminology and research methods, with experience applying educational field data
context.additional_context: Emphasizing the development of practical statistical competencies for elementary school teachers to analyze and utilize diverse educational data for decision-making

learning_goals: Descriptive statistics (mean, variance, standard deviation) using educational field data can be accurately calculated and interpreted
One can establish an educational effectiveness analysis design considering sampling surveys and sampling errors
One can determine significant differences in educational programs through hypothesis testing and prepare reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
